name: Delivereat
description:
DELIVEREAT How to play?
  • Do not touch the cars.
  • Grab burgers on the road to fill your bag.
  • Shoot burgers on red buildings to get points.
<LeftArrow>: Go to left <RightArrow>: Go to right <X>: Shoot a burger to the left <O>: Shoot a burger to the right Presentation

You are an independent contractor of a ruthless burger delivery service, and you are late. Take your bike, you have to pickup burgers and deliver them to your clients quickly or you will be fired (as an independent contractor).

Pickup burgers that are on the road to fill your bag, and shoot the burgers on clients buildings to get points!
